explains: n. 能力，胜任；权限，管辖权；技能；感受态，反应能力；<旧>足以谋生的收入（尤指非劳动所得）
wordGroup: core competence 核心竞争力；核心才能
language competence 语言表达能力
competence model 能力模型；胜任能力模型

sentences.en: Many people have testified to his competence.
sentences.cn: 很多人已证实了他的能力。

sentences.en: The judge has to act within the competence of the court.
sentences.cn: 法官必须在法庭的权限范围内行使权力。

sentences.en: He stood out in terms of competence from all his fellows.
sentences.cn: 他在能力方面比他所有同事都突出。
